message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to sell it to you for $13500. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $15000. I think we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I'm willing to make a deal at this price.

Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $12000, but I'm not willing to go that low. Considering the product's value to you is $15000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $13750. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12875. I'm willing to make a deal at this price.

Hi Bob, I understand your latest offer of $12875, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to compromise a bit more. I'm counteroffering at $13500. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
